title: ICE: index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 1', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:803:53

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-debug-assertions
labels.description: This issue requires debug-assertions in some way

labels.name: requires-custom-config
labels.description: This issue requires custom config/build for rustc in some way

body:
### Code this happened while building `rustc-std-workspace-core` stage1 with rustc + debug assertions ```Rust #![feature(no_core)] #![no_core] pub use core::*; ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 1dda298ad39a64e019a3511139c5b13ac0a18e54 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
